description.zh-cn: 东汉末年政治家、军事家、文学家与诗人，三国时代曹魏政权的奠基者。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, warlord, and poet of the late Eastern Han dynasty who rose to great power and laid the foundations for the state of Cao Wei in the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的父亲，宦官曹腾的养子，官至太尉。
description.en: Father of Cao Cao and adopted son of the eunuch Cao Teng. He reached the rank of Grand Commandant.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期的宦官，曹操的养祖父。
description.en: A eunuch who served in the Eastern Han dynasty and was the adoptive grandfather of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的儿子，曹魏的开国皇帝。
description.en: Son of Cao Cao and the first emperor of the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期由曹丕建立的政权。
description.en: One of the three major states that competed for supremacy over China in the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的军阀，曹操早年的朋友和后期的主要对手。
description.en: A warlord of the late Eastern Han dynasty who was an early friend and later a major rival of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的权臣和军阀，其乱政导致了群雄割据的局面。
description.en: A powerful minister and warlord of the late Eastern Han dynasty whose tyranny led to the rise of regional warlords.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的军阀，以勇武著称。
description.en: A warlord of the late Eastern Han dynasty known for his martial prowess.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的徐州牧。
description.en: Governor of Xu Province during the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的军阀，盘踞于南阳，后投降曹操。
description.en: A warlord of the late Eastern Han dynasty based in Nanyang, who later surrendered to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期蜀汉的开国皇帝，曹操的主要对手之一。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period and a major rival of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期东吴的开国皇帝，曹操的主要对手之一。
description.en: The founding emperor of the state of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period and a major rival of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 东汉的最后一任皇帝。
description.en: The last emperor of the Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的主要谋士之一，官至尚书令。
description.en: A key advisor to Cao Cao, who served as Prefect of the Masters of Writing.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的谋士，英年早逝。
description.en: An advisor to Cao Cao who died at a young age.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的人物评论家。
description.en: A character commentator during the late Eastern Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 东汉名臣，早期赏识曹操才能的人物之一。
description.en: A renowned official of the Eastern Han dynasty who was one of the first to recognize Cao Cao's talent.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年文学家，“建安七子”之一，后被曹操所杀。
description.en: A writer of the late Eastern Han dynasty and one of the Seven Scholars of Jian'an, later executed by Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的谋士，因恃才放旷而被曹操所杀。
description.en: An advisor to Cao Cao who was executed for his arrogance and sharp wit.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年的著名医学家，后因触怒曹操而被杀。
description.en: A renowned physician of the late Eastern Han dynasty, who was executed after offending Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操与袁绍之间的一场决定性战役，曹操以少胜多，奠定了统一北方的基础。
description.en: A decisive battle between Cao Cao and Yuan Shao. Cao Cao's victory laid the foundation for his unification of northern China.

description.zh-cn: 孙权和刘备联军在赤壁击败曹操大军的战役，奠定了三国鼎立的基础。
description.en: A decisive battle in which the allied forces of Sun Quan and Liu Bei defeated Cao Cao's navy, leading to the formation of the Three Kingdoms.

description.zh-cn: 关羽北伐曹操的关键战役，初期威震华夏，最终因孙权背盟偷袭而败亡。
description.en: A key battle during Guan Yu's northern campaign against Cao Cao. Guan Yu was initially successful but was ultimately defeated due to Sun Quan's betrayal and surprise attack.

description.zh-cn: 刘备的义弟和主要将领，以勇猛和忠义著称。
description.en: A sworn brother and major general of Liu Bei, known for his bravery and loyalty.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的继室，曹丕、曹彰、曹植、曹熊的生母。
description.en: Cao Cao's second wife and the mother of Cao Pi, Cao Zhang, Cao Zhi, and Cao Xiong.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的长子，为救曹操而战死。
description.en: Cao Cao's eldest son, who died in battle while saving his father.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的妾室，曹昂和曹铄的生母。
description.en: A concubine of Cao Cao and the mother of Cao Ang and Cao Shuo.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的儿子，三国时期著名文学家。
description.en: A son of Cao Cao and a renowned poet of the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一个朝代，曹操是其末期的重要权臣。
description.en: A dynasty in Chinese history, during the end of which Cao Cao was a prominent and powerful official.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的出生地，位于今安徽亳州。
description.en: Cao Cao's birthplace, located in modern-day Bozhou, Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 东汉的都城之一，曹操在此逝世。
description.en: One of the capitals of the Eastern Han dynasty, where Cao Cao passed away.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的高级官职，相当于宰相。曹操曾长期担任此职，掌握实权。
description.en: A high-ranking official position in ancient China, equivalent to a chancellor or prime minister. Cao Cao held this position for a long time, wielding actual power.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝的王爵封号，曹操晚年受封此爵位。
description.en: A royal title of the Han dynasty, which Cao Cao was granted in his later years.

description.zh-cn: 汉献帝的皇后，因图谋铲除曹操而被废黜并杀害。
description.en: An empress of Emperor Xian of Han, who was deposed and executed for plotting against Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操是曹嵩的儿子。
description.en: Cao Cao is the son of Cao Song.

description.zh-cn: 曹嵩是宦官曹腾的养子。
description.en: Cao Song was the adopted son of the eunuch Cao Teng.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕是曹操的儿子。
description.en: Cao Pi is the son of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹昂是曹操的长子。
description.en: Cao Ang is the eldest son of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹植是曹操的儿子。
description.en: Cao Zhi is the son of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 武宣卞皇后是曹操的继室。
description.en: Empress Bian was Cao Cao's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 刘夫人是曹操的妾室。
description.en: Lady Liu was a concubine of Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 曹操与袁绍在早年相处甚厚。
description.en: Cao Cao and Yuan Shao were very close in their early years.

description.zh-cn: 曹操在官渡之战中与袁绍决战，并最终消灭了袁氏集团。
description.en: Cao Cao fought a decisive battle with Yuan Shao at Guandu and eventually eliminated the Yuan clan's power.

description.zh-cn: 曹操拒绝董卓的拉拢，并发起和参与了讨伐董卓的战役。
description.en: Cao Cao refused Dong Zhuo's overtures and initiated and participated in the campaign against him.

description.zh-cn: 曹操在下邳之战中击败并处死了吕布。
description.en: Cao Cao defeated and executed Lü Bu in the Battle of Xiapi.

description.zh-cn: 因父亲曹嵩被杀，曹操发兵征讨徐州牧陶谦。
description.en: Following the murder of his father Cao Song, Cao Cao launched a campaign against Tao Qian, the governor of Xu Province.

description.zh-cn: 曹操的父亲曹嵩被陶谦的部下所杀。
description.en: Cao Cao's father, Cao Song, was killed by Tao Qian's subordinates.

description.zh-cn: 曹操于196年迎接汉献帝至许昌，从此“挟天子以令诸侯”，掌握了东汉朝廷的实际控制权，汉献帝成为其傀儡。
description.en: In 196, Cao Cao welcomed Emperor Xian to Xuchang, thereafter 'holding the emperor hostage to command the nobles,' seizing actual control of the Eastern Han court and making the emperor his puppet.

description.zh-cn: 曹操在名义上是东汉的臣子，官至丞相，爵至魏王。
description.en: Cao Cao was nominally a subject of the Eastern Han, holding the positions of Chancellor and King of Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹操为曹魏政权奠定了基础。
description.en: Cao Cao laid the foundation for the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹丕迫使汉献帝禅让，正式建立曹魏。
description.en: Cao Pi forced Emperor Xian of Han to abdicate and formally established the state of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 官渡之战的胜利极大地增强了曹操的实力，为其统一北方奠定了基础。
description.en: The victory in the Battle of Guandu greatly enhanced Cao Cao's power and laid the foundation for his unification of northern China.

description.zh-cn: 袁绍在官渡之战中惨败，其势力从此一蹶不振。
description.en: Yuan Shao suffered a devastating defeat in the Battle of Guandu, from which his power never recovered.

description.zh-cn: 曹操在赤壁之战中被孙刘联军击败，统一南方的企图受挫。
description.en: Cao Cao was defeated by the allied forces of Sun Quan and Liu Bei in the Battle of Red Cliffs, thwarting his attempt to unify southern China.

description.zh-cn: 荀彧是曹操的重要谋士。
description.en: Xun Yu was an important advisor to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 荀彧因反对曹操封魏公而失宠，不久后去世。
description.en: Xun Yu fell out of favor for opposing Cao Cao's enfeoffment as Duke of Wei and died shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 郭嘉是曹操的谋士。
description.en: Guo Jia was an advisor to Cao Cao.

description.zh-cn: 许劭对曹操“乱世之英雄”的评价使曹操声名鹊起。
description.en: Xu Shao's assessment of Cao Cao as a 'hero in a chaotic world' greatly boosted his fame.

description.zh-cn: 桥玄很早就看出曹操的才能，认为他能安定天下，并鼓励他。
description.en: Qiao Xuan recognized Cao Cao's talent early on, believed he could bring stability to the world, and encouraged him.

description.zh-cn: 张绣在宛城反叛，导致曹操长子曹昂战死。
description.en: Zhang Xiu's rebellion at Wancheng led to the death of Cao Cao's eldest son, Cao Ang.

description.zh-cn: 孙权在关羽北伐时偷袭荆州，俘虏并杀害了关羽。
description.en: Sun Quan launched a surprise attack on Jing Province during Guan Yu's northern campaign, capturing and executing him.

description.zh-cn: 因伏皇后图谋铲除自己，曹操将其废黜并杀害。
description.en: Because Empress Fu plotted to eliminate him, Cao Cao had her deposed and executed.

description.zh-cn: 曹操因不能容忍孔融的言行而将其诛杀。
description.en: Unable to tolerate Kong Rong's words and actions, Cao Cao had him executed.

description.zh-cn: 曹操因杨修恃才放旷、干预世子之争而将其诛杀。
description.en: Cao Cao executed Yang Xiu for his arrogance and interference in the succession dispute.

description.zh-cn: 华佗因不肯为曹操专职治病而触怒曹操，被下狱拷问致死。
description.en: Hua Tuo angered Cao Cao by refusing to serve as his personal physician and was imprisoned, tortured, and killed.
